item.title: Our culture doesn't understand redemption: PROOF
item.description: [![](http://benrwoodard.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/img_0379.jpg)](http://benrwoodard.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/img_0379.jpg)Studies have shown that about $1 billion in gift card money doesn't get redeemed every year. This is free money so why does this happen? There are a few requirements that the redemption process has in it that may hinder redeeming gift card money. Value must be locked up A code must be used to unlock the value The value must be used in the market it was locked up in
